Package BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class MultiGuardBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.GuardBESA
BESA.Kernel.Agent.MultiGuardBESA
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProtocolStackBESA
public abstract class MultiGuardBESA extends GuardBESA
This class represents a guard that can have different behaviors for different or for the same agent. It use the field ack (name given by historical reasons) of DataBESA. TODO Verificar.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

    • funcEvalBool

      public boolean funcEvalBool(StateBESA objEvalBool)
      Evaluates if the guard must be or not executed by the behaviors.By default the function returns true, the guard is executed with the occurrence of the event, if not desire this then is due to rewrite this function in the subclass.
      Overrides:
      funcEvalBool in class GuardBESA
      Parameters:
      objEvalBool - Internal agent state, used to verify the execution condition.
      Returns:
      true if the guard must be executed; false otherwise.

    • funcExecGuard

      public void funcExecGuard(EventBESA event)
      Conduct to execute when the guard initializes. The guard is executed within a behavior to which it has been associated. The conduct depends on the data associated to the event. The conduct depends and/or can modify the agent state. This conduct watches the field ack and if multiguardAck associated has the same data that ack, executes multiguardaAck.
      Specified by:
      funcExecGuard in class GuardBESA
      Parameters:
      event - Received event, contains the related data.
